issue_title: [Test] Missing test coverage for to_dict/from_dict round-trip preserving all fields

tdd_plan.description: Add failing regression test for to_dict/from_dict round-trip

test_cases.name: test_todo_to_dict_from_dict_roundtrip_preserves_all_fields
test_cases.description: Verify basic Todo round-trip preserves all 5 fields (id, text, done, created_at, updated_at)

test_cases.name: test_todo_to_dict_from_dict_roundtrip_with_special_characters
test_cases.description: Verify round-trip handles special characters (unicode, emojis, quotes, backslashes)

test_cases.name: test_todo_to_dict_from_dict_roundtrip_with_long_text
test_cases.description: Verify round-trip handles very long text (1000+ chars)

implementation_sequence.action: Run tests to verify they pass (no implementation changes needed)

rationale: The issue is for MISSING TEST COVERAGE only - not a bug. The existing to_dict() and from_dict() implementations in src/flywheel/todo.py are correct. This is purely a test addition task to add regression tests that verify round-trip behavior.
